main event: One object seen flying in a circle for 1 1/2 to 2 minutes.
interesting points: The sighting occurred on 15 December 1957,The observation was made from the ground,The object was seen for a duration of approximately 1.5 to 2 minutes,Only one object was reported in the sighting,The source of the report was a civilian.
sighted object: one object flying in a circle
